content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, please consider that I'm eager to secure the highest possible amount. Let's begin negotiations with my initial proposal of 1250 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is quite expensive. I would like to propose 850 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this prime location apartment far exceeds your suggested price of 850 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Here is my offer. I am willing to rent the apartment for 1000 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 1000 Euros per month!
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
